column3: 与皮姆讨价还价的方法
艾斯塔里亚，我们毫不了解你
#02要离开游戏并\n返回标题界面吗?

column2: I Can't See You, But I Can Feel You
column3: 我看不见你，但能感受到你
#02要退出游戏并\n返回电脑桌面吗？

column2: System Data has not been saved.\nReturn to title screen anyway?
column3: 系统文件尚未保存。\n还要返回标题界面吗？

column2: Ys II Chronicles+ is already running.\nYs I cannot run concurrently.
column3: 伊苏2编年史正在运行。\n伊苏1无法正确运行。

column2:
ia 6 months ago
to research its ancient
ruins, and happened to be in
the tower when the monsters
first appeared.
column3:
在塔的密室中遇到的学者。
半年前，为了调查古代遗迹
而来到了艾斯塔里亚。
后来，在调查达姆之塔时，
被突然涌出的魔物
困在了塔中。

column2:
A dwarf from the plains.
Looks fearsome, but is
actually quite weak. May
present a challenge at
first, but will quickly
become a pushover.
column3:
栖息在草原的小人族。
虽然外表看起来瘆人恐怖，
但力量很弱，并不强大。
初见时可能会苦战一番，
但只要积累了一点经验，
徒手也可以将其打倒。

column2:
A red-furred feral dog that
roams the Esterian plains.
Moves quickly and often
attacks in packs, making it
a real threat to the unwary
traveler.
column3:
奔跑在草原的红色猛犬。
漂流到岸上的亚特鲁
被其袭击后送进了医院。
它们动作灵活，成群结队，
所以一定要特别小心。
最好做足准备再与其战斗。

column2:
A monster who lies in wait
on the lowest level of the
shrine to slice apart its
prey with a magic-infused
sword. Hides its true form
beneath a cloak.
column3:
神殿最下层的魔物。
时刻等待着用魔法
强化过的剑将入侵者
砍成碎片的时机。
它被斗篷包裹看不到真身，
推测其大概是高级的魔族。

column2:
A bitter relative to the
Accumate who dwells far from
its brethren, on floor 10 of
Darm Tower. Not very strong,
but boasts tremendously high
agility.
column3:
栖息在达姆之塔10层。
属于艾克梅特一族，
力量较弱，但敏捷大幅提升。
和同族的艾克梅特关系不好，
在塔中也是分开生活着。

column2:
A bug-beast that dwells in
the abandoned mine. Its
slippery body deflects sword
strikes, and its sharp fangs
can pierce armor. Doesn't
go down easily.
column3:
徘徊在废坑的妖虫。
光滑的身体能弹开剑刃，
锐利的牙齿能咬破铠甲。
它们不是几刀就能杀死的，
必须将它们大卸八块，
直到其完全停止活动才行。

column2:
A half-bug half-man that
dwells in the abandoned
mine. Its exoskeleton grants
it excellent defense and
speed alike. Attacks with
chaotic sword-swipes.
column3:
栖息在废坑中的怪物。
同时拥有虫子和人类的特性，
向四周挥舞着巨大的刀刃。
外骨骼的身体敏捷又强韧，
半吊子的攻击会被反弹回去。

column2:
A hand-selected Riffligan
inhabiting floor 18 of Darm
Tower. The elitest of the
elite, boasting sword tech-
niques other monsters could
only dream of.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔18层。
从利弗利刚中选出的
精英中的精英。
有着魔物中最华丽的剑技，
以轻盈的步伐玩弄对手。

column2:
A semi-transparent life-form
that lurks in the abandoned
mine. Its jelly-like body
latches on to its victims
and begins dissolving them.
Aim for the eye.
column3:
潜伏在废坑的半透明生物。
拥有弹性十足的胶状肉体，
能溶化掉抱住的猎物。
被砍中身体也会迅速恢复，
只能通过破坏眼球将其打倒。

column2:
A soulless, steel-armored
sentry guarding Rado's Annex
around floor 15 of the Tower
of Darm. Ordered to dispose
of any intruders who attempt
to gain entry.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔15层附近。
钢铁铠甲中寄宿着
邪恶意念的重装士兵。
被命令守护拉朵之塔，
迅速消灭一切接近塔的人。

column2:
Inhabits floor 20 of Darm
Tower. The strongest warrior
amongst the monsters, by
leaps and bounds. Attempting
to take on more than one at
a time is suicide.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔20层。
拥有其它魔物望尘莫及的
战斗力的最强战士。
想要同时对付数个，
那就是自寻死路。
在密室中守护着最强之剑。

column2:
A monster found beneath the
shrine. Often thought to be
the head of a giant, but no
one knows for certain. Its
bloodshot eyes unendingly
scan for fresh meat.
column3:
出没于神殿地下的怪物。
据说它是巨人族的头部，
但其真实身份尚未确定。
苍白的皮肤上布满了血管，
满是血丝的眼睛为寻找猎物
而闪闪发光。

column2:
Luta's wife. Lives in Zepik
and constantly worries about
her husband, who sleepwalks
almost every night, often
putting himself in grave
danger in the process.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的女性。
她的丈夫卢达突然失踪了，
很担心他会跑去危险的地方。
据说是得了梦游症，
不知道梦游到哪里去了。

column2:
A bloated dryad from the
plains, formed from the
malevolence within a rotted
tree. Very dry, inhibiting
its mobility, which makes it
an easy foe to take down.
column3:
出没于草原的木人。
邪恶的力量寄宿在枯萎的
树木中，进而产生的怪物。
因为水分不足，行动迟缓。
冷静应对就不足为惧。
熟练的人能一击打倒它。

column2:
A sworn guardian of the
shrine in life, resurrected
by a sinister will. Inside
its armor, it is completely
decayed. The stench of death
on it is overpowering.
column3:
徘徊在神殿周边的魔物。
本是守护神殿的战士的遗骸，
但被邪恶的力量所复活。
铠甲内部的肉体已经干枯，
接近时能闻到刺鼻的腐臭。

column2:
A bull-headed monster that
dwells beneath the shrine.
Emerges from the darkness
swinging an enormous blade
wildly, startling even the
hardiest of adventurers.
column3:
出没于神殿地下的怪物。
牛首人身，向四周挥舞着
巨大的刀刃。浮现在黑暗中的
白色身姿，能让胆小的人
害怕到失去意识。

column2:
A creature with such heavy
armor that only the mighty
can hope to damage it.
Dwells in the lowest caves
of the abandoned mines, and
cannot be easily overcome.
column3:
徘徊在废坑最下层的魔物。
用厚重的铠甲包住全身，
会不顾一切向前突击。
无法承受那份重压的人，
只能在黑暗中被压死。

column2:
An animal bred for its
obnoxiously cute and tender
little body. Sup on its
toothsome nibblets slathered
in Roda butter or straddling
bacon. Adorably delicious!
column3:
艾斯塔里亚的传统家畜。
肉味鲜美好吃，烤煮皆宜。
除了巴尔巴多港口镇饲养的，
还有一部分野生种群
栖息在草原上。

column2:
A monster residing in the
abandoned mine. Its appear-
ance is strange and almost
humorous, but its attacks
are much more deadly than
any encountered previously.
column3:
出没于废坑的怪物。
虽然外表奇特，还有些滑稽，
但力量却远超草原上的魔物。
如果没有经过充分的锻炼，
会被秒杀的，一定要小心。

column2:
A fearsome ogre inhabiting
Darm Tower's mirror maze.
Uses its sculpted body as a
weapon, and manages to out-
perform the Eucreas despite
having no real defense.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔・镜之间。
以训练有素的肉体为武器的
深红战鬼。一旦抓到对手，
直到化为肉片才会放开。
在没有魔力援助的情况下，
战斗力也凌驾由库利斯之上。

column2:
A beast with an enormous,
gaping maw. The sight of its
drooling visage in pursuit
is nightmare-inducing.
Devours its prey, but no one
knows where the remains go.
column3:
出没于废坑的怪物。
巨大的嘴流着口水，
步步逼近的样子，
足以成为人们的梦魇。
估计是个大胃王， 但永远
不知道吃掉的东西去了哪里。

column2:
A monstrous phoenix from the
abandoned mine. Why a bird
would dwell underground, and
why its flames shed no
light whatsoever, are both
questions without answers.
column3:
栖息在废坑中的魔鸟。
作为鸟却不在天空中翱翔，
肯定是有什么原因的吧。
虽然身上缠绕着火焰，
但周围的环境却不会变亮，
可能也是因为同样的原因吧。

column2:
An armored monster dwelling
around floor 3 of the Tower
of Darm. Characterized by
its red armor and its speed,
but presents little issue if
taken out one by one.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔3层附近。
特征是红色铠甲和动作敏捷，
但是防御力并不是很高。
只要不被包围，逐个击破，
就不会被逼入绝境。

column2:
A member of the Barbado
militia, charged with
providing escort to those
who travel to the city of
Minea or Zepik Village.
Seems to have his eye on
Minea's dancer.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的青年。
作为自卫队的一员，护送居民
前往米内亚镇和塞皮克村。
喜欢年长的女性，
对米内亚镇里上的舞女
抱有似有若无的好感。

column2:
Charlotte's father and
Ephy's grandfather. Once
lived in Rastin, but lost
his home, his wife and his
son-in-law when monsters
attacked from the silver
mine there.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的老人。
夏洛特的父亲，艾菲的祖父。
以前一直住在拉斯汀村，
但是有一天，村子被
从矿山里涌出的蝙蝠摧毁了，
他的妻子和女婿也因此丧生。

column2:
A giant insect-like monster
inhabiting the catacombs
beneath the shrine. Scuttles
toward its prey while emit-
ting a shrill cry that could
give anyone goosebumps.
column3:
栖息在神殿地下的妖虫。
只是巨大的虫就足以让人
产生生理上的厌恶感了，
要是还会吱吱地叫着，
沙沙地靠过来，
更是让人不禁起鸡皮疙瘩。

column2:
Saunters about the abandoned
mine, skewering prey with
its spear and horns. Ranked
as superior officer to the
Uhnos, giving it an air of
dignity. Has a cute tail.
column3:
徘徊在废坑的怪物。
用右手的短枪和头部的犄角
将敌人刺穿。是神殿中的
乌诺斯上位魔物，可能是
因为这个，它的姿态很奇特。
它的长尾巴魅力十足。

column2:
An armored monster dwelling
around floor 1 of the Tower
of Darm. Wields two swords,
but wears inferior armor,
making it vulnerable to even
the weakest of attacks.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔1层附近。
双手持剑，以惊人的攻击力
为傲。但防御力比废坑的
魔物还要低不少。
如果谨慎作战的话，
弱小的武器也能打倒它。

column2:
A mud-like monster dwelling
within Rado's Annex. Digests
through absorption and moves
far quicker than one would
expect. Will eat anyone,
human and monster alike.
column3:
徘徊于拉朵之塔的粘体。
就算是魔物，只要接近它
也会被缠住将其消化吸收。
拥有和外表不符的敏捷度
和坚韧度，其它魔物也很
害怕它。

column2:
A cruel magician inhabiting
Darm Tower's mirror maze.
Cloaked, and wields a magic
sword. Able to freely move
amongst the mirrors, and
enjoys toying with its mark.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔・镜之间。
阻挡在通往塔顶之路上的
魔法剑士。身披带有魔力的
斗篷，手持泛着红光的魔剑。
在镜子迷宫中行动自如，
玩弄着入侵者。

column2:
A fast-moving hard-shelled
monster that bustles about
in the abandoned mine. Due
to its quick speed within a
dimly-lit environment, the
Menon presents real danger.
column3:
在废坑里四处飞窜的魔物。
虽然身体很小，但拥有灵敏
坚韧的身体，小看它的话，
一瞬间就会被反杀。
是在能见度较低的废坑中
最需要提防的敌人之一。

column2:
Inhabits floor 19 of Darm
Tower. A warrior with talons
on both arms, as well as
armor layered upon naturally
scaly skin. Will not break
its stride, no matter what.
column3:
徘徊于达姆之塔19层。
双臂有巨大钩爪的战斗生物。
包裹身体的铠甲是皮肤硬化
而成的，因此不会妨碍行动。
在达姆之塔的一角
守护着最强的铠甲。

column2:
A spirit of the dead bearing
the darkened flame of a long
forgotten grudge. Approaches
the living in hopes of find-
ing a new friend to dwell
eternally by its side.
column3:
徘徊于神殿地下的亡灵。
身上缠绕着怨念的黑色火焰，
时刻等待着将活着的人
拉入它们的行列。
在具备足够的力量前，
最好避免与它们交战。

column2:
Guardian of the Silver Armor
in Darm Tower's mirror maze.
Wears thick armor, but its
intelligence is the real
threat. Chases down intru-
ders with intent to behead.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔・镜之间。
虽然穿着厚重的铠甲，
却是至今为止的敌人中
最敏捷的。在镜子迷宫中
守护着银铠，
对侵入者发动无情的斩击。

column2:
A savage beast wandering the
shrine. Can tear its prey to
shreds in a single moment
using its claws and tusks,
and its thick mane is soaked
with blood. Smells awful.
column3:
栖息于神殿地下的魔兽。
本性凶猛，发现猎物后
会用爪牙瞬间将其
撕成肉片。丰盈的鬃毛上
沾满了污水和血脂，
周身散发着腐烂的臭味。

column2:
Found in Darm Tower's mirror
maze. A creature built from
intertwining mushroom fibers
filled with deadly nerve
toxins. Beware the dire grip
of its sinuous tentacles!
column3:
徘徊于达姆之塔・镜之间。
身体是由菌纤维掺和组成的。
挥动着触手，来回晃荡着。
触手会分泌一种神经毒素，
鲁莽接近它是很危险的。

column2:
An unpleasant creature found
on floor 9 of Darm Tower.
Looks just like the statues
found elsewhere, so the un-
prepared may be caught off-
guard. Surprisingly fierce.
column3:
出没于达姆之塔9层。
相同姿态的石像放置在各处，
若大意地认为它不会动的话，
就会遭到袭击。
它们不仅力量强大，
还是个阴险狡诈的对手。

column2:
A girl Adol rescues from a
cold, lonely cell beneath
the shrine. Doesn't remember
anything but her name, and
has no idea why she'd been
locked away in the first
place.
column3:
被幽禁在神殿地下的
圣域中的少女。
失去了名字以外的记忆，
不知道为什么
会被关在这种地方。

column2:
Dwells on floor 17 of Darm
Tower. Charges its opponents
in a straight line, making
short work of them. Best not
to attack a Kelmarel head-on
lest you be quickly gored.
column3:
栖息在达姆之塔17层。
时刻等待在一条长路上
刺杀侵入者。
与它们正面交锋会很不利，
所以想要前进需要下点工夫。

column2:
A top-tier guardian dwelling
only on floor 6 of the Tower
of Darm. Its attack power is
tremendous, but in a pinch,
it can be bypassed entirely.
Running may be advisable.
column3:
栖息在达姆之塔6层。
动作迟钝，但攻击力巨大。
如果要与它正面交锋，
就要做好遭受重创的准备。
它只在6层的一部分地区，
可以不与其战斗直接绕行。

column2:
Entrusted as a guardian of
the Silver Sword and Shield,
the Genoid is descended from
giants and possesses appro-
priately herculean strength.
Found around the 7th floor.
column3:
栖息在达姆之塔7层附近。
继承了太古巨人族的血统，
拥有与种族相称的强大力量。
相对的，它没装备任何防具，
防御力并不是很高。
守护着银剑和银盾。

column2:
Daria's son. Lives in Minea.
Constantly attempts to
convince his mother in
Barbado to come live with
him in Minea, but she won't
hear him out. This has him
very troubled.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的男性。
达莉亚婆婆的独生子。
他一直在劝说住在
巴尔巴多港口镇的母亲
搬来米内亚镇居住，
但是母亲一点也不听劝，
让他很是困扰。

column2:
A kindly, reserved woman
from Zepik, beloved by all
the villagers. Recommends
speaking with an old woman
named Jeba if you have any
questions pertinent to your
adventure.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的女性。
性格内敛，但是待人和善，
受到大家的仰慕。
如果有什么想要询问的事情，
她会推荐你去找一位叫做
洁瓦的博闻强识的老妇人。

column2:
A member of the Barbado
militia, known for keeping
a cool head at all times.
Believes that there is
courage in knowing when to
run from battle, and when to
stay and fight.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的青年。
虽然是自卫队的一员，
但并不拘泥于保护城镇。
而是冷静地分析事物的类型，
并认为在和魔物的战斗中，
偶尔也需要不勉强自己，
敢于撤退的勇气。

column2:
Sara's aunt, who lives in
Zepik Village. Extremely
well-versed in Esteria's
history and culture, herbs,
and even fortunetelling.
The other villagers really
look up to her.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老妇人。
是米内亚镇的占卜师
莎拉的姑妈，
对艾斯塔里亚的文化与历史
造诣很深。
也精通药草与占卜的知识，
受到周围村民们的尊敬。

column2:
A little girl from Minea,
born to Julius and Fana.
Considers Sara the fortune-
teller her best friend, and
is always looking for the
'legendary brave soul' on
Sara's behalf.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女孩。
尤利乌斯和法娜的独生女，
和占卜师莎拉关系很好。
莎拉正在寻找「旅行的剑士」，
所以她看到外表相符的人，
就会搭话让其去拜访占卜师。

column2:
A former miner from Minea
who lost his job when the
monsters showed up. Tried to
resist, but was unable; and
ever since, he's become
utterly terrified of the
abandoned mine.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的男性。
以前在矿山工作，
因为魔物的出现而失业。
尽管大家拼死抵抗，
但还是毫无还手之力，
对废坑中魔物的恐惧
深深地印在了他的脑海里。

column2:
A patron of Orman's bar in
Minea who spends every
waking hour drinking and
gossiping with Cezar. Has
been a bit depressed of late
due to the hiatus of his
beloved troubadour.
column3:
在米内亚酒馆内的青年。
和塞萨尔相对而坐，
边闲聊边喝酒。
最近他喜欢的吟游诗人
没有吹奏曲子了，
这让他有些在意。

column2:
A Minean resident who once
climbed a Roda Tree all the
way to its tippy-top. Now,
he's grown old and weak, but
thanks to Dr. Klaus, he's
still just as chipper as he
ever was.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的老人。
多亏了克劳斯医生的处方，
他仍能像过去一样活力满满。
最近他开始变得腿脚不便了，
所以不敢再那么乱来了，
他年轻时可是爬上过
草原上的大树顶端哦。

column2:
A patron of Orman's bar in
Minea. Used to be a tour
guide, but has been out of a
job since the Stormwall
first appeared. Remains
disturbingly optimistic
despite his hardships.
column3:
在米内亚酒馆内的青年。
本来是艾斯塔里亚的导游，
因为魔物的出现而失业。
据说在岚之结界出现以前，
他带学者去过山上的遗迹。
乐天的性格，让他在失业中
也格外地开朗。

column2:
An attractive middle-aged
man who's been running a
weapon shop in Minea for
many years. Well-versed in
combat; can easily discern
the combat potential of
customers. Dios' father.
column3:
米内亚镇的武器店老板。
在艾斯塔里亚经营武器店
多年的充满魅力的中年男人。
不光是武器，对战斗技巧
也有很深的造诣，还能看出
使用者的实力。
防具店老板迪奥斯的父亲。

column2:
A very young girl living in
Minea after her hometown of
Rastin was destroyed.
Doesn't understand what
happened, and thus hopes to
return home one day, and
resume her normal life.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女孩。
因为年纪还小，所以不太能
理解拉斯汀村遇袭的悲剧。
她希望有一天能回到村子里，
和大家一起过上以前的生活。

column2:
Doctor Bludo's only son.
Lives in Barbado Port. Saved
freshly-beached Adol from
being eaten alive by a
Rheboll. After the monsters
appeared, Slaff founded a
militia to fight them.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的青年。
布卢多的独生子。
亚特鲁被冲上白号角沙滩时，
是他从利波鲁口中将其救下。
在魔物开始到处游荡之后，
他组建了一支自卫队
来保护城镇。

column2:
A boy from Minea. Loves it
when his grandfather, Franz,
tells him the story of the
legendary Silver Sword. One
day hopes to hold it in his
own hands and vanquish
monsters with it.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的男孩。
很喜欢祖父弗朗兹讲的
「银色之剑」的故事。
他希望有一天，
能用那把剑赶走魔物群。

column2:
Head of the bandits residing
in the Thieves' Den at the
foot of Darm Tower. Would
never rob from the weak or
defenseless, and is highly
respected by all those who
serve under him.
column3:
在盗贼碉堡里的盗贼团首领。
虽然被人们所恐惧着，
但他以「不抢夺弱者的东西」
为信条，在达姆之塔的脚下
建立了一个据点。正如他的
信条所言，他是个注重道义，
受到部下信任的人。

column2:
Lives with his muscular
brother Bron in Minea, but
Bron's become hospitalized
due to a mining injury, so
Archelle is all alone now.
He visits Bron at the clinic
each and every day.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的少年。
和自信强壮的哥哥一起生活，
但哥哥布隆在矿山里受伤，
现在住院中。尽管只剩自己，
也没有特别悲观，
每天都会去看望哥哥。

column2:
Minea's armorer. Obsessed
with armor, and gets mad
if you tell him the best
defense is a good offense.
Believes instead in survival
of the fittest. Son of the
weaponsmith, Rosetty.
column3:
米内亚镇的防具店老板。
作为防具迷，完全反对
攻击是最好的防御这一说法。
认为能活下来才是胜利，
会根据使用者的不同
提供合适的防具。
武器店老板罗赛提的儿子。

column2:
Barbado's requisite bratty
boy. Fascinated by the world
outside the town gates.
Wants to join the militia
when he grows up. Always
seen together with the
neighbor's daughter, Cheryl.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的男孩。
正值活泼好动的年纪，
对镇外的世界很感兴趣。
想在长大后加入自卫队
赶走魔物。
和邻居家的雪莉露关系很好，
经常在一起玩。

column2:
A Barbado Port resident.
Watches over the town from
its highest rooftop,
patiently and systematically
keeping an eye out for any
invading monsters. Is known
as Slaff's right hand man.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的青年。
他为了监视魔物的动向，
一直在屋顶观察着城镇周围。
他勤奋又有耐心，
作为斯拉夫的左膀右臂
守护着巴尔巴多的安全。

column2:
A woman living in Barbado.
Used to be active in silver
trade, but has become rather
despondent ever since the
Stormwall appeared. Secretly
prays for it to go away,
every single night.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的女性。
因银的交易而热闹的港口镇，
转眼间又变回了原来的乡村，
这令她意志消沉。
她每天晚上都会偷偷祈祷，
希望岚之结界能快点消失。

column2:
A drunkard from Minea. Used
to be a fan of hard liquor,
but has recently discovered
the wide world of wine.
Always compares vintages,
and fancies himself an
expert. Plans to wed soon.
column3:
在米内亚酒馆内的醉鬼。
以前主要喝啤酒和烧酒，
最近开始对葡萄酒有了兴趣，
每天都在葡萄酒。
正值酷爱喝酒的24岁。
顺带一提他打算近期结婚。

column2:
An old man hospitalized in
Minea. Was struck from
behind, and had his Silver
Shield stolen by an unknown
assailant-- likely one of
the thieves from the moun-
tain region, he believes.
column3:
在米内亚医院里住院的老人。
被骚扰城镇的强盗袭击，
背后受到钝击而入院。
代代相传的银盾也被偷了，
真是祸不单行。

column2:
Minea's mayor. A highly
trusted figure amongst the
townsfolk, but the troubles
of late have saddened him.
He constantly worries that
Minea's walls won't be
enough to protect everyone.
column3:
米内亚镇的镇长。
德高望重，为大家所信赖。
魔物出现后不断发生的问题，
让他感到十分的痛心。
他每天都在担心烦恼着，
觉得坚固的城墙
可能无法保护好大家。

column2:
A woman from Zepik who
worries about her health
faltering due to the large
number of elderly indivi-
duals living around her.
Also worries about the elder
due to his frantic behavior.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的少女。
由于村里以老年人居多，
所以很担心大家的健康状况。
最近村长的样子很奇怪，
所以很担心他是不是
哪里出了什么问题。

column2:
An old man from Zepik who
used to work as a miner. In
those days, he recalls there
were two Goddess statues en-
shrined in a mine cavern--
but one day, one of them
simply disappeared!
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老人。
年轻时，在银矿山做矿工。
他说当年，在矿山的深处
放置有两座女神像，
但不知何时就少了一座。

column2:
A woman living in Barbado.
Hasn't heard from her friend
in Minea since the monsters
first appeared. Seriously
considering requesting a
militia escort for a visit,
to assuage her fears.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的女性。
自从街道开始出现魔物后，
就和住在米内亚镇的朋友
失联了，因此十分担心
对方的安危。目前正在考虑
要不要请自卫队
护送自己到米内亚去。

column2:
Daughter of Minea's mayor.
Always lived a life of
frivolity, but now that the
cost of commodities has
risen, she's been forced to
give it up. Presently still
searching for a new hobby.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性。
镇长的女儿，在银的交易
繁荣时期，十分喜爱购物。
不同于外表，性格很坚强，
在物价飞涨之后，
克制住了购物的热情，
目前正在寻找新的乐趣。

column2:
Son of Minea's mayor. Due to
his unrestricted freedom
growing up, he still acts a
bit childish. Hearing doom
prophesied by Sara the
fortuneteller, however,
sobered him up quite nicely.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的青年。
镇长的儿子，可能是因为
从小生活无忧的缘故，
有着与年龄不符的孩子气。
听到占卜师莎拉的
灾难预言后，
就难掩内心的焦虑不安。

column2:
Freddy's wife, and Johan's
mother. Lives in Minea, but
seems unconvinced that the
wall around the city offers
any real protection. Feels
suffocated by the goings-on
throughout Esteria.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性。
弗雷迪的妻子，约翰的母亲。
自从魔物出现之后，
整个艾斯塔利亚的窒息氛围
令她头痛不已。
认为哪怕有城墙的保护，
也不是绝对安全的。

column2:
A fortuneteller living in
Minea. Renowned for her
startling accuracy, having
even predicted the Stormwall
and monster invasion. Sees
something in Adol, and
guides him on a quest to Ys.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的占卜师。
大家对她的评价非常高，
这次岚之结界与魔物的出现
也都被她预言到了。
从来自艾斯塔里亚外面的
亚特鲁身上看出了什么，
引导其展开关于伊苏的冒险。

column2:
An old man from Zepik who
was rescued from monsters
by Goban. Now regards the
thieves as honorable indi-
viduals, and believes the
recent incidents must have
been someone else's doing.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老人。
以前遭遇魔物袭击时，
是古邦救了他。
因此认为古邦是个人物，
无法相信近来惊扰世间的
盗贼骚动会是古邦他们干的。

column2:
Sole doctor at the clinic in
Barbado Port. Nursed Adol
back to health after he was
found on Whitehorn Beach.
Acts tough around his son,
Slaff, but turns to jelly
around his nurse, Ayla.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的医生。
他治疗了被卷入岚之结界，
漂流到白号角沙滩的亚特鲁。
和儿子斯拉夫一样都很固执，
但是好像在护士艾拉面前，
气势就会被压一头。

column2:
A wide-eyed youth from
Barbado Port. Put everything
he had into becoming the
best trader he could be--
but then the Stormwall came
and ruined everything. Now,
he's just always very sad.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的青年。
拥有年轻人的野心和行动力，
在港口镇因贸易而繁荣时，
他竭尽所能地扩大交易，
但现在由于岚之结界的影响，
无法再进行贸易活动了，
这让他感到非常的灰心丧气。

column2:
A warrior from Minea, hired
by Orman to aid in the thief
hunt. Has dedicated himself
to sampling the world's
cuisine, and wishes to find
the fabled Roda Seed during
his stay in Esteria.
column3:
在米内亚酒馆内的战士。
是酒馆老板雇来猎捕盗贼的。
云游各地品尝珍馐
是他的毕生事业，
正在艾斯塔里亚
寻找「萝妲种子」中。

column2:
Mayor Marcel's wife. Offers
her husband unconditional
support in these trying
times. Claims that the wall
around the city was not a
recent construct, but has
been there since antiquity.
column3:
米内亚镇的镇长夫人。
尽管对城镇被袭击感到不安，
但仍支持着身为镇长的丈夫。
据她所说，作为米内亚象征的
城墙并不是最近建造的，
而是很久以前就存在的。

column2:
Elbert's wife, and Mark's
mother. Lives in Zepik, and
is very set in her ways.
Serves as a model housewife,
devoting herself completely
to always making her home a
more comfortable one.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的女性。
就算周围的状况发生了变化，
也保持着主妇的生活节奏。
以「阖家欢乐」为座右铭
过着每一天。
是艾尔巴特的妻子，
马克的母亲。

column2:
The only child in Zepik, but
he doesn't let that get him
down! He's perfectly content
just playing outside, and
can often be found fishing
at the lake or basking in
the rays of the sun.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的男孩。
虽然是村里唯一的孩子，
但他完全不在意这种事，
充满活力地在大自然中玩耍。
非常喜欢湖，总是在享受
垂钓和晒太阳的乐趣。

column2:
An old man living in Zepik
who absolutely loves fishing
at the lake, and does so
every single day. He rarely
ever catches anything, but
he doesn't seem to mind--
he just enjoys the sun!
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老人。
虽然他每天都会在码头钓鱼，
不知道他是在钓鱼，
还是在晒太阳，
不过本人一副无所谓的样子。

column2:
A fat thief who seems like a
ruffian at first, but has a
real heart of gold. Used to
work in the mines with Goban
and almost lost his life
down there, but Goban saved
him from his fate.
column3:
在盗贼碉堡内的胖男人。
外表看起来很粗鲁，
但他内心温厚，重人情。
在一次矿工纠纷中差点丧命，
是古邦救了他。

column2:
Mason's wife, and Cheryl's
mother. Outwardly demure,
but actually quite a fire-
cracker. Does her best to
support her family through
these difficult times, and
always remains optimistic.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的女性。
梅森的妻子，雪莉露的母亲。
虽然表面娴静，但性格坚强，
在被岚之结界困住后，
仍然积极地生活着。

column2:
A waitress at the bar in
Barbado. Since there are no
customers anymore, she has
more free time than she
knows what to do with. As a
result, she's been thinking
about joining the militia.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的少女。
酒馆的女服务员， 但是因为
没有客人，所以闲得很。
为了更好地利用时间，
让缺乏运动的身体动起来，
正在考虑要不要加入自卫队。

column2:
A young thief working under
Goban, and the first thief
Goban recruited. Has a foul
mouth and even fouler tem-
perament, but is a very
honorable man who would
never betray anyone's trust.
column3:
在盗贼碉堡内的瘦男人。
说话难听，性格更差，
但绝不会背叛有义气的人。
虽然年轻，但是实际上是
跟随古邦时间最长的老盗贼。

column2:
Two heads may be better than
one, but these two are worse
than anything! As they come
in for the attack, one head
is real and the other illu-
sory. When damage is dealt,
the two tag off.
column3:
等待在镜之间深处的魔物。
两个中有一个是幻影，
攻击幻影不会造成伤害。
真身遭受到攻击后，
会瞬间和幻影交换。
需要做好打持久战的准备。

column2:
A former trader from Barbado
Port. After the Stormwall
appeared, trading became
impossible, but fishing was
more productive than ever.
Betelo has a real talent for
seeing the bright side.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的渔夫。
虽然贸易因岚之结界而中断，
但他积极地认为，
只要能捕到鱼，就不会挨饿。
脚踏实地生活的他，
并不太在意经济环境的波动。

column2:
A man from Minea. Has been
keeping watch at the city
gate to ensure that no
children leave the safety of
its walls. Spotted a shady
man inside the city recently
however, and is concerned.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的男性。
为了防止孩子们去到危险的
外边，而在入口附近看守着。
最近他看到个可疑的
穿着斗篷的男人，
他觉得这是个不祥的预兆。

column2:
A young man hospitalized in
Minea with injuries from a
Rheboll attack. Narrowly
averted death by escaping to
the shade of one of the
great trees on the plain.
The monsters did not follow.
column3:
在米内亚医院里住院的青年。
他被利波鲁袭击而受伤入院。
当时他逃到耸立在草原上的
大树下，才侥幸得救。
不知为何，魔物好像不会
靠近那棵大树。

column2:
A deeply devout old woman
from Zepik who believes that
the village's treasure, the
Silver Bell, is what keeps
the monsters at bay. She
feels that its tonal quality
has a purifying effect.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老妇人。
她信奉宗教，坚信村里的
宝物「银铃」在保护村子
免受魔物侵袭。
事实上，银铃发出的清脆
音色确实有着某种裨益。

column2:
One of Goban's men, with a
penchant for breaking walls.
Rescues Adol from prison in
the Tower of Darm, along
with Luta Gemma. Strong,
kindly and loyal, he and
Adol quickly become friends.
column3:
在塔的地下牢房遇到的男人。
性格豪爽，力量强大，
他打碎石墙将被关在
地下牢房的亚特鲁和卢达
救了出来。
是盗贼团的一员，
古邦的得力助手。

column2:
A dearly beloved troubadour
who plays lovely harmonica
music for anyone who will
listen. Found herself in
Minea, and seeks to tighten
the spiritual bonds amongst
its inhabitants with song.
column3:
在米内亚镇遇到的少女。
吹奏口琴的吟游诗人，
不知从何时起出现在了
米内亚的街角。
通过音乐和镇上的居民
建立了心灵的纽带，
不管男女老少都很喜欢她。

column2:
An old man from Minea with a
great love of Esterian lore.
Often reads its legends to
his grandson, Lucca, as
fairytales. Very close with
Sara the fortuneteller, and
worries for the future.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的老人。
他熟悉艾斯塔里亚的
古代传说，并将其当作
童话故事讲给孙子路卡听。
他和占卜师莎拉是朋友，
艾斯塔里亚最近发生的灾难，
让他感到有一股不祥的气息。

column2:
A dancer from Minea. Wears
make-up to appear mature,
but only just turned 20.
Hates when people wallow in
depression, so she dances at
Orman's bar in an effort to
boost everyone's spirits.
column3:
在米内亚酒馆内的舞女。
化妆后看起来很成熟，
其实只有二十岁。
她不喜欢沉闷的气氛，
因此她细致地服务众人，
确保每个人都能在酒馆里
玩得开心。

column2:
Elbert's mother. Lives in
Zepik, and fancies herself
an expert in wild plants,
nuts, berries and the like.
Used to pick Roda Fruit all
time time, but lately, it
simply hasn't been growing.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老妇人。
艾尔巴特的母亲。
喜欢采集野菜和水果。
以前还能从耸立在草原的
大树上采摘到美味的果子，
但最近大树都不结果了，
这令她感到非常遗憾。

column2:
An old man from Zepik who
believes that if monsters
exist, then so too must the
Goddesses described in the
ancient legends. As such, he
spends his days praying for
the Goddesses to appear.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老人。
他觉得既然魔物真实存在，
那曾经拯救了艾斯塔里亚，
记录在古文书上的「女神」
也应该存在。
为此，他每日都在祈祷。

column2:
An old lady from Zepik who
adores ghost stories, and
readily blames unexplained
occurrences on ghosts. Warns
of a hooded spirit in the
shrine to the north, though
who can say if it's real?
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老妇人。
她热衷于奇闻怪谈，一发生
不可思议的事，就立刻说是
鬼魂幽灵作祟。她忠告说
神殿中栖息着披头巾的亡灵，
但必须去那里亲眼见证下，
才能知道是真是假。

column2:
A popular old man from
Barbado. Known to be very
wise, often giving advice to
youngsters who've lost their
way. Incidentally, he's not
bald; rather, he apparently
shaves his head every day.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的老人。
具有稳健、深思熟虑的性格，
会给迷茫的年轻人各种启发。
顺带一提，他并不是秃头，
只是每天早上都会剃光头发。

column2:
A young man from Minea who's
become obsessed with Pim,
the pawn shop owner. Can't
wrap his head around how Pim
could find an item on the
ground yet have the audacity
to keep it and sell it.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的青年。
对在镇上经营交易所的皮姆
颇有微词。在艾斯塔里亚，
居民互助是最基本的常识。
而皮姆却将失物当商品来卖，
这种厚颜无耻令他哑口无言。

column2:
Betel's young daughter. In
search of a boyfriend, and
isn't very picky about his
personality as long as he's
handsome-- but won't date
younger men. Seems to have
seen the black-cloaked man.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性。
贝特尔老人正值青春的
独生女。正在找对象中，
只要长得帅，形迹可疑的
也能接受，但不能比自己小。
她在附近看到过一个穿着
黑斗篷的男人。

column2:
A woman who lives in Minea
after her hometown of Rastin
was destroyed by monsters.
Once lost the will to live,
but regained it by focusing
on her daughter, Ephy, and
Reah's beautiful music.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性。
曾经住在拉斯汀村，
但是有一天村子被从矿山
涌出的蝙蝠摧毁了。
虽然一度失去了生存的勇气，
但她听到女儿艾菲和蕾雅的
演奏后，又重新振作了起来。

column2:
A wizard who blocks the path
to the lower levels of the
shrine. Teleports at will
while conjuring streams of
blue flame from the sides of
the room. Proves to be a
most wily opponent indeed.
column3:
在神殿的深处封印着
通往地下道路的魔道师。
自由地操纵火焰和瞬间移动，
阻挡着想要深入前进的人。
要是被两侧喷出的火焰包围，
一瞬间便会被烧成白骨。

column2:
A terrifying bug that flies
in at great speed, hurling
deadly sickles. Attacks any
who disturb its nest, as
evidenced by the remains of
its victims strewn about.
Requires agility to defeat.
column3:
出现在达姆之塔８层的
巨大魔物。
巢穴中四散着遇难者的遗骸。
它使用高速飞翔的镰刀
切碎靠近的人。想要打倒它，
就需要看穿镰刀的飞行轨迹，
利用短暂的漏洞进行攻击。

column2:
A one-eyed drunkard from
Minea. Not much to look at,
but he has a good heart, and
is greatly depressed by the
loss of an important item.
Should be at work, but fears
his boss' fists of fury.
column3:
在米内亚酒馆里的独眼男。
虽然面相凶狠，但内心淳朴，
因为丢失了重要的东西
而感到非常苦恼。
他旷工在酒馆喝得酩酊大醉，
如果被师傅发现的话，
估计会受到一顿铁拳制裁。

column2:
An old man from a long line
of dairy farmers. Primarily
breeds pikkards, but hasn't
had access to good grazing
land since the monsters
appeared, so he now operates
from Barbado's town square.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的老人。
家中世代都从事奶酪畜牧业，
主要饲养比卡多。
可魔物的出现导致无法放牧，
目前放在镇上的广场饲养。

column2:
Minea's chief carpenter. Is
presently searching for one
of his men, Donis, who's
been grievously slacking on
the job. Intends to smack
some sense into Donis, then
drag him right back to work.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的木匠师傅。
在寻找旷工的独眼男多尼斯。
工作那么忙居然还敢偷懒，
准备找到这家伙后教训一顿，
再带回去工作。

column2:
Minea's bartender. A man of
many muscles, having once
worked as a mercenary on the
mainland. Has become rather
concerned by the ongoing
thefts around Minea, and is
thus planning a thief hunt.
column3:
米内亚镇的酒馆老板。
曾在大陆当过佣兵的壮汉。
退役后开了酒馆，在听闻
接连发生银制品被盗事件后，
打算近期去猎捕盗贼。

column2:
A barterer who runs a shady
pawn shop in Minea where all
goods-- including stolen and
lost items-- are fair game.
Renowned for never lowering
his prices, but claims them
all to be negotiable.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的商人。
经营着一间交易所，买卖
各种商品，只要能卖掉，
即使是赃物或失物也不会
介意。极少接受讨价还价，
但是如果耐心地不断交涉，
也可能会让步的。

column2:
Buck's wife. Lives in Minea,
despite being daughter to
the elder of Zepik. Is very
concerned for her father, as
he seems gravely troubled,
but refuses to discuss it
with any of the villagers.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性，
巴克的妻子。
很担心身为塞皮克村村长的
父亲。近来他心事重重的，
总是在说「不能告诉村民们」。

column2:
Linda's husband, and Mark's
father. As one of the few
young men in Zepik, he feels
it's his duty to patrol for
monsters. Recently spotted
the man in the black cloak
pass through to the north.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的青年。
琳达的丈夫，马克的父亲。
作为塞皮克村里为数不多的
年轻人，为防止魔物入侵
而巡逻。不久前，目击到
一个穿着黑斗篷的可疑男子
前往了北边那个方向。

column2:
A bartender in Barbado. Due
to the Stormwall, his bar
gets no new customers these
days, despite once being a
hopping locale. Constantly
dwells on his prior success,
which just brings him down.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的男性。
经营着一家酒馆，但是由于
岚之结界，酒馆门可罗雀，
处于停业关门的状态。
一边回忆着这里曾经挤满
船员们的热闹时光，一边
寂寞地打发着多余的时间。

column2:
A boy from Minea. Complains
that he hasn't been able to
play at the big trees in the
north since the monsters
came. Believes climbing one
of those trees would be the
best feeling in the world.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的男孩。
魔物出现后 ，就再也不能
去喜欢的大树那玩了，
所以感到很不开心。
自从爬过草原北方的大树后，
镇上和街道上的树木
就无法再满足他了。

column2:
A patron of Orman's bar in
Minea. Used to work in the
silver mine, but after its
closure due to demon infes-
tation, he began drinking
heavily-- and he was already
a big drinker to begin with.
column3:
在米内亚镇酒馆的青年。
曾在银矿山工作，魔物
出现后没了工作，成天
自暴自弃地喝酒度日。
有工作的时候也会以
「今天也努力了一天」
为理由喝酒。

column2:
Head nurse at Klaus' clinic
in Minea. Has been handling
in-patient care whenever
Klaus is out on house calls.
Her care and counsel is so
desired that many patients
pray for a lengthy recovery.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的护士。
代替经常不在医院的克劳斯，
承担着入院患者的护理工作。
据说有的患者为了让莉莎
照顾，而祈祷伤势慢点恢复。

column2:
Has the face of an old man,
but is only in his twenties.
Has grown weary of being
single, but lives amongst
mostly elderly individuals
in Zepik Village, making his
girlfriend hunt a challenge.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的男性。
虽然长相看起来十分老成，
但其实才二十几岁。最近，
开始觉得单身很是寂寞。
虽然他想要找个女朋友，
可是塞皮克村多为老人，如何
邂逅年轻女性是他在烦恼的。

column2:
Torrance's wife, and Danny's
mother. Born and raised in
Barbado, and is a real beach
babe at heart, but worries
for the safety of her son.
Can't decide if moving to
Minea is the right decision.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的女性。
托兰斯的妻子，丹尼的母亲。
土生土长的巴尔巴多人，
是个地地道道的海滨之民，
但为了孩子的安全，
正在犹豫是否要搬到
有城墙的米内亚去。

column2:
A carpenter living in Minea.
Has been exceptionally busy
lately due to the influx of
immigrants from Barbado.
Greatly admires Darm Tower
for being such an impossible
feat of engineering design.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的木匠。
也许是因为最近迁居的人
变多了，木匠的工作变得
十分繁忙。
他每次看到巨大的达姆之塔，
都会对其庞大的建造规模
感到钦佩。

column2:
Minea's resident doctor. Has
been exceptionally busy ever
since the monsters appeared,
and is more often out and
about than in his clinic. A
well-reputed, well-liked and
dedicated professional.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的医生。
魔物出现后变得非常繁忙，
多数时候反而都不在医院里。
作为名医受到镇上所有人的
尊敬，为了不辜负大家的
期待，每天都四处奔波着。

column2:
Zepik's elder. Guards the
Silver Bell, which has been
the village's treasure for
generations. Seems troubled
recently, though, and seeks
a kindly non-villager to aid
him in an important matter.
column3:
塞皮克村的村长。
他家代代相传着
村子的象征「银铃」。
近来似乎遇到了大麻烦，
正在寻找村民以外的
可以依靠的人。

column2:
A poet and troubadour from
Zepik who sleepwalks almost
nightly, constantly worrying
his wife by wandering out to
the plains without even
realizing it. Started around
the time the monsters came.
column3:
住在塞皮克村的吟游诗人。
自从魔物出现后，
他就被梦游症所困扰，
总会在不知不觉中四处游荡。

column2:
The creature from the mines
who annihilated the village
of Rastin in a single night.
Divides itself into innumer-
able bats, swarming its prey
without mercy. Only vulner-
able when it re-forms.
column3:
出现在废坑最下层的魔物。
半年前，它一夜之间摧毁了
拉斯汀村。能分身出无数的
蝙蝠包围住敌人。
只有在现出真身时才能对其
造成伤害，想要打倒它的话，
需要有及时找准机会的勇气。

column2:
A deadly crimson sphere that
surrounds itself with rocks
of varying size and shape,
and hurls them throughout
the room at will. Your only
hope of defeating it is to
find an opening and take it.
column3:
出现在达姆之塔14层的
岩石怪物。在真身鲜红的
光球周围漂浮着无数的岩块。
就算害怕危险而远离它，
也会成为飞来的石弹的猎物。
想要活下来，就必须拿出勇气
踏入岩石风暴之中。

column2:
Little girl in Barbado. Her
father wants to return to
the mainland, but Cheryl is
unwilling to leave her buddy
Danny behind. Even more of a
menace than he is, always
plotting an escape to Minea.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的女孩。
虽然她父亲想要返回大陆，
但是她不想离开有朋友在的
艾斯塔里亚。
其实她比丹尼还要淘气，
甚至打算穿过有魔物出没的
街道去米内亚玩。

column2:
An old lady from Barbado.
Her son and daughter-in-law
in Minea want her to move in
with them, but she refuses
to leave her dear hometown--
though she does worry about
her mischievous grandchild.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的老妇。
她拒绝了住在米内亚镇的
儿子儿媳要她搬去一起住的
请求，因为她不想离开家乡。
她唯一担心的是贪玩的孙子
会不会乱来。

column2:
A woman from Minea. Has been
a bit on edge lately with
all the rumors of thievery,
but takes solace in Minea's
safety from monsters. Still,
she can't quite bring her-
self to let her guard down.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性。
最近接连发生的盗窃事件
让她对盗贼提高了警惕。
虽然对城墙的保护感到安心，
但周围环境的变化
又让她隐隐感到不安。

column2:
A woman from Minea. Franz's
daughter and Lucca's mother.
Knows the land's folklore
well, just like her father.
Claims there was once to be
a south gate built in Minea,
but the plan was scrapped.
column3:
住在米内亚镇的女性。
弗朗兹老人的女儿，
路卡的母亲。受到父亲的影响
对古代传说很熟悉。据她说，
以前人们想在米内亚的城墙上
建造南门，但因为墙壁太结实
而没能建成。

column2:
A beast guarding one of the
sealed Books of Ys. Wriggles
wildly, charging intruders.
The only way to defeat it is
to avoid its speedy attacks
and strike its joints before
it slides too far away.
column3:
在被封印了数重的神殿地下，
守护着伊苏之书的怪物。
出现入侵者时会现出真身，
利用高大的身体袭向对方。
想要打倒它，需要一边躲开
高速攻击过来的尖牙，
一边斩断柔软的关节部位。

column2:
A trader in Barbado Port.
Lived in the city, but came
to Esteria with his family
to deal in silver. Now, with
the Stormwall, all he thinks
about is finding a way back
home, away from the madness.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的商人。
他以前住在城市里，但为了
在银的交易中投机赚钱，
带着家人来到了艾斯塔里亚。
被预料外的岚之结界困住后，
他满脑子想的都是返回大陆。

column2:
A young man hospitalized in
Minea. Boasts of his might,
so when monsters appeared in
the mine, he tried to fight
them off-- but it didn't go
well. Sleeps off his pain,
dreaming of naughty things.
column3:
在米内亚医院里住院的青年。
想要展示力量而去挑战
出现在矿山的魔物，
结果遭到反击受伤入院。
虽然身负重伤，
却还做着香甜的秽梦，
看来性格相当乐天。

column2:
An open-minded old lady from
Zepik, who seems willing to
give anyone the benefit of
the doubt. When asked about
the monsters or the thieves,
she simply says, 'I don't
know what they're thinking.'
column3:
住在塞皮克村的老妇人。
上了年纪依旧豁达并且
精力充沛的老奶奶。
认为魔物和盗贼都是一群
「不知道在想什么的家伙」。

column2:
Sole nurse at the clinic in
Barbado Port. Kindly treated
Adol's wounds after he was
found. Generally very sweet,
but when she gets mad, she's
scary as all hell. That may
be why she's still single.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的护士。
在亚特鲁的伤势痊愈之前，
一直亲切地照护着他。
平时很温柔，但是生气起来
会很恐怖，布卢多和斯拉夫
都不敢违抗她。顺带一提，
她现在正在找对象中。

column2:
A patient in Minea's clinic.
Was attacked by Rhebolls on
his way to Minea from Zepik,
and seems to have been trau-
matized by the experience.
Still has nightmares about
Rhebolls chasing after him.
column3:
在米内亚医院里住院的青年。
从塞皮克村来米内亚的途中，
被利波鲁追赶并受了伤。
袭击对他造成了心理阴影，
甚至梦中也被利波鲁追赶着。

column2:
A pessimistic young man from
Barbado. The sudden troubles
in Esteria really shook him
up. Wants to move to Minea
with his family, but always
wusses out when he considers
the monsters along the way.
column3:
住在巴尔巴多港口镇的男性。
突如其来的灾难让他很心烦，
每天都想着悲观的事情，
虽然想带着家人一起搬到
拥有坚固城墙的米内亚去，
但想到途中可能被魔物袭击，
就很难下定决心。

column2:
A descendant of Fact, one of
the Six Priests of Ys, who's
become corrupted by a lust
for power. Seeks to gather
the six Books of Ys for his
own nefarious purposes, and
will do anything to get them.
column3:
坐在达姆之塔最上层的人物。
六神官之一法克特的子孙，
被魔的力量所魅惑，
给艾斯塔里亚招致各种灾难。
他暗中的所有行动都是为了
集齐六本伊苏之书，
将古代王国的力量据为己有。

column2: A scholar hiding out in a\nsecret room in Darm Tower.\nCame to Ester
column3:
在塔的密室中遇到的学者。
半年前，为了调查古代遗迹
而来到了艾斯塔里亚。
后来，在调查达姆之塔时，
被突然涌出的魔物
困在了塔中。
